epamanak da nowa anuradhapura disthrikkaye horowpathana margaye wanaalingen gahanaya wi athi halambaagaswawa shri sangharamaya 1950 warshaye aarambha kara athi muth kalayage awamen yuda wathawaranayath samanga abhawayata pathwa thibi 2011 warshaye di nawatha aarambha karana lada mema wiharasthanaye siyaluma adupadu soya bala eewa prathisanskaranaya kara 2013 warshaye katina punya mahothsawaya samastha lanka bauddha maha sammelanaye purna dayakathwayen sidukeruni. 2017 warshaye di dushkarathawalin piri walioya kalyanipura mayurawapi wiharasthanaye katina pinkama sandaha da bodu maha samuluwe dayakathwaya laba duni. 2018 warshaye dakunu palathe pihiti aithihasika sithulpawwa rajamaha wiharasthanaye katina punya mahothsawaya pawathwimata da dayaka wiya.
